menu.name: Burger
menu.description: A juicy beef patty grilled to perfection, topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, and a special house sauce, all encased in a toasted sesame seed bun.

menu.name: Pizza
menu.description: A delicious hand-tossed pizza with a crispy golden crust, topped with rich tomato sauce, melted mozzarella cheese, and a variety of fresh toppings of your choice.

menu.name: Fries
menu.description: Crispy golden fries, lightly salted and served with your choice of ketchup, mayonnaise, or a tangy dipping sauce. Perfect as a side or snack.

menu.name: Pasta
menu.description: A rich and creamy pasta dish made with freshly cooked al dente pasta, tossed in a savory garlic butter sauce, and topped with Parmesan cheese and fresh herbs.

menu.name: Chicken Wings
menu.description: Crispy, deep-fried chicken wings tossed in a flavorful blend of spices, served with a side of ranch or blue cheese dressing.

menu.name: Salad
menu.description: A fresh and healthy mix of crisp lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, and croutons, tossed in a light vinaigrette dressing.

menu.name: Sandwich
menu.description: A freshly made sandwich with layers of deli meats, fresh veggies, and creamy sauces, served in a soft toasted bun.

menu.name: Tacos
menu.description: Soft or crunchy tortillas filled with seasoned meat, fresh salsa, cheese, and a hint of lime for the perfect bite.

menu.name: Sushi
menu.description: Delicate sushi rolls filled with fresh fish, avocado, and rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

menu.name: Steak
menu.description: A perfectly grilled steak cooked to your preference, served with a side of mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables.

menu.name: Smoothie
menu.description: A refreshing blend of fresh fruits, yogurt, and honey, served chilled for a healthy and delicious treat.

menu.name: Ice Cream
menu.description: Creamy and rich ice cream in a variety of flavors, topped with chocolate syrup, sprinkles, and nuts.

menu.name: Pancakes
menu.description: Fluffy golden pancakes stacked high, drizzled with maple syrup, and topped with fresh berries and a pat of butter.

menu.name: Muffin
menu.description: A soft and freshly baked muffin, available in blueberry, chocolate chip, or banana nut flavors.

menu.name: Coffee
menu.description: A freshly brewed cup of aromatic coffee, served hot with your choice of milk, cream, or sugar.
